mapper.select: select d.donation_number, d.donation_amount, d.donation_products, d.donation_date, i.nickname, n.nursery_school_photo, n.nursery_school_member_name from tbl_donation d, tbl_individual_member i, tbl_nursery_school_member n where d.individual_member_number = i.individual_member_number and d.nursery_school_member_number = n.nursery_school_member_number order by donation_date desc limit 9;

select d.donation_number, d.donation_amount, d.donation_products, i.nickname, n.nursery_school_member_name, d.donation_date, i.individual_member_email from tbl_donation d, tbl_individual_member i, tbl_nursery_school_member n where d.individual_member_number = i.individual_member_number and d.nursery_school_member_number = n.nursery_school_member_number order by d.donation_number desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}

select d.donation_amount, d.donation_products, i.nickname, n.nursery_school_member_name, d.donation_date, i.individual_member_email from tbl_donation d, tbl_individual_member i, tbl_nursery_school_member n where d.donation_number = i.individual_member_number and i.individual_member_number = n.nursery_school_member_number and donation_products like CONCAT(‘%’, #{donationProducts}, ‘%’)

select d.donation_amount, d.donation_products, i.nickname, n.nursery_school_member_name, d.donation_date, i.individual_member_email from tbl_donation d, tbl_individual_member i, tbl_nursery_school_member n where d.donation_number = i.individual_member_number and i.individual_member_number = n.nursery_school_member_number order by d.donation_date desc;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_donation (donation_date, donation_products, donation_detail_products, quantity, box_quantity, individual_member_number, nursery_school_member_number) values(#{donationDate}, #{donationProducts}, #{donationDetailProducts}, #{quantity}, #{boxQuantity}, #{individualMemberNumber}, #{nurserySchoolMemberNumber});
